name: RemoveFolderClassifications
description:
Remove classifications from a specified folder.

Use this tool to remove any security classifications applied to a specific folder. It is useful when needing to update or clear the classification status of folders in an enterprise setting.

parameters.name: folder_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier representing a folder. Obtain this by visiting the folder URL (e.g., `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`). The root folder ID is `0`.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a folder.

The ID for any folder can be determined
by visiting this folder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`
the `folder_id` is `123`.

The root folder of a Box account is
always represented by the ID `0`.
